projects.title: Multi-Robot Simulation Platform
bullets: Developed a multi-robot simulation platform in ROS2, improving task efficiency and enabling automated testing for diverse experimental evaluations.
Scaled simulation from Webots to ROS2, enhancing collaboration and technical decision-making in navigation agents development.
Mentored peers in developing navigation agents, fostering skills in QA and data visualization for improved project outcomes.

projects.title: Quantized Spiking Neural Network
bullets: Engineered an 8-bit quantized spiking neural network for embedded deployment using PyTorch, enhancing power efficiency through custom quantization methods.
Collaborated on automated testing pipelines to ensure quality assurance and improve system reliability.
Mentored team members in technical decision-making and data visualization techniques.
